name: ayika-backend
description: Ayika Django Backend - Emergency Aid and Needs Coordination Network

scripts.docker:clean: docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f
scripts.docker:shell: docker exec -it ayika-backend-dev python manage.py shell
scripts.docker:migrate: docker exec -it ayika-backend-dev python manage.py migrate
scripts.docker:makemigrations: docker exec -it ayika-backend-dev python manage.py makemigrations
scripts.docker:createsuperuser: docker exec -it ayika-backend-dev python manage.py createsuperuser
scripts.docker:collectstatic: docker exec -it ayika-backend-dev python manage.py collectstatic --noinput

author: Ayika Team
